title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: South Korea and Japan will hold working-level diplomatic talks in Seoul this afternoon.South Korea's director-general for Asian and Pacific affairs, Kim Jung-han , will meet his Japanese counterpart Shigeki Takizaki at Seoul's foreign ministry.They will discuss Tokyo's export curbs and Seoul's subsequent decision to terminate a military intel-sharing pact.The meeting comes a week before South Korean Prime Minister Lee Nak-yon's scheduled visit to Japan to attend Emperor Naruhito's coronation ceremony.The two officials last met in Tokyo a month ago.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
